analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#608-621):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#621)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#621)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#480-562):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#492-501)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#506-512)
	- updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#527-530)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#542-546)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#548-552)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#547-548)

CrowdsaleExt.updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParticipantWhitelist(reciever,tokensBought) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#670-673)

CrowdsaleExt.setStartsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(time >= crowdsale.endsAt()) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#767)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(time <= crowdsale.startsAt()) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#798)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#425-470):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#446-448)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#463-464)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#467)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#468-470)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#467)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#450-451)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#460-461)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#480-562):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#492-501)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#506-512)
	- updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#527-530)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#540-541)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#538)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#860-878) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#876-878)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/43/0x9932e06d9d51f8a36dc7dbcf8e58ac8cfc0e35eb.sol#876-878)
